java/liquibase/database/sql/DropPrimaryKeyStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.FirebirdDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase;
00006 import liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase;
00007 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00008 
00009 public class DropPrimaryKeyStatement implements SqlStatement {
00010 
00011     private String schemaName;
00012     private String tableName;
00013     private String constraintName;
00014 
00015     public DropPrimaryKeyStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String constraintName) {
00016         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00017         this.tableName = tableName;
00018         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00019     }
00020 
00021     public String getSchemaName() {
00022         return schemaName;
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getTableName() {
00026         return tableName;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public String getConstraintName() {
00030         return constraintName;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00034         if (getConstraintName() == null) {
00035             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase
00036                     || database instanceof PostgresDatabase
00037                     || database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00038                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database requires a constraint name to drop the primary key", this, database);
00039             }
00040         }
00041 
00042         if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00043             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " DROP CONSTRAINT " + getConstraintName();
00044         } else if (database instanceof PostgresDatabase) {
00045             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " DROP CONSTRAINT " + getConstraintName();
00046         } else if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00047             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " DROP CONSTRAINT "+getConstraintName();
00048         }
00049 
00050         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " DROP PRIMARY KEY";
00051     }
00052 
00053     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00054         return ";";
00055     }
00056 
00057     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00058         return true;
00059     }
00060 }
